word:
Christ created human beings, and then, by a life of suffering and humiliation and a death of agony and shame, He redeemed them from sin. O, sinner, the Saviour endured all this for you. He died that you might be led to see the sinfulness of sin and come unto Him that you might have life.--Ms 3, 1901. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. April 6, 1987. Entire Manuscript.
